TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LicenseContext extends System.Object implements class System.IServiceProvider

Docs.summary: Specifies when you can use a licensed object and provides a way of obtaining additional services needed to support licenses running within its domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides the default LicenseContext. It implements only run-time support and does not support saved license keys.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string GetSavedLicenseKey (Type type, System.Reflection.Assembly resourceAssembly);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetSavedLicenseKey(class System.Type type, class System.Reflection.Assembly resourceAssembly) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the type of component.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a saved license key for the specified type, from the specified resource assembly.
Docs.returns: The for the specified type. This method returns unless you override it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetService(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of service to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the requested service, if it is available.
Docs.returns: An instance of the service, or if the service cannot be found.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetSavedLicenseKey (Type type, string key);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetSavedLicenseKey(class System.Type type, string key) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the component associated with the license key.
The to save for the type of component.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets a license key for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Typically, call this method when you set <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode> at design time. You must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext.UsageMode%2A> property to implement design-time license support.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that specifies when you can use a license.
Docs.value: One of the values that specifies when you can use a license. The default is .
